title: Ezreal ult insane cooldown
body: Like a 90 second cd with 40 cdr. It does magic damage too. He's already trash compared to champs like jinx and other long range adcs. I mean wtf.

replies.body:
It goes down by 1 second every time you land a q. He is also a very good early/mid game poke champ.

Jinx is a late game hypercarry, not really comperable to ez. Ez is also very safe compared to most adc's with his e.

His ult does a ton of damage too, you just have to make sure not to hit any minions with it first, each thing hit lowers its damage by 8% I think it was? Down to 30%.

> [{quoted}](name=GastonBarnacles,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wQPWUXFG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-16T10:33:36.193+0000)
>
> Minions block his poke.

so? you don't need to land his Q on a champion to get the CD reduction, all you need is to have your Q land onto something. Whether it's a champion, minion, monster or pet it doesn't matter

> [{quoted}](name=GastonBarnacles,realm=EUNE,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=wQPWUXFG,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-10-16T10:33:36.193+0000)
>
> Minions block his poke.

Which would be insane otherwise
If you are not looking for a good discussion, then don't try to argue
